ta.title: රනිල්ගේ සෞඛ්‍ය තත්ත්වය මත එජාප සංවත්සර සැමරුම කල් දමයි
body_lines: ඒ, හිටපු ජනාධිපති රනිල් වික්‍රමසිංහ මහතාගේ සෞඛ්‍ය තත්ත්වය ද සැලකිල්ලට ගෙන බව සඳහන්ය.
முன்னாள் ஜனாதிபதி ரணில் விக்ரமேசிங்குக்கு வழங்கப்பட்ட மருத்துவ ஆலோசனை மற்றும் நிர்வாகக் குழு உறுப்பினர்களின் வேண்டுகோளின் பேரில் இந்த முடிவு எடுக்கப்படும்.

en.title: UNP anniversaries postponed UNP anniversary depending on Ranil's health condition
body_lines: The UNP management committee has decided to postpone the 79th anniversary of the UNP, which was scheduled to be held on Saturday (06).
It is said that the health condition of former President Ranil Wickremesinghe was also taken into account.
The UNP's Secretary of the United National Party (UNP) said that the decision was held in Colombo today (02).
UNP General Secretary General of Parliamentarian General Secretary General of the National Party (UNP) will be held on the 79th anniversary ceremony of the UNP on a different day.
The decision will be taken on the request of the medical advice and management committee members who have been given to former President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
